snippet: Mack Brown, the Texas football coach who led the Longhorns to the 2005 national title and ranks second at the university in career victories, is stepping down.
abstract: Mack Brown, Texas football coach who led the Longhorns to the 2005 national title and ranks second at the university in career victories, is stepping down after 16 seasons.
lead_paragraph: Mack Brown, the Texas football coach who led the Longhorns to the 2005 national title and ranks second at the university in career victories, is stepping down.
